title: Bungalow Bay | Garden City Beach, SC
description: Tucked away, on a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of Garden City Beach, SC, are the quaint cottages of Bungalow Bay. Just minutes from the ocean, these raised 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom single-family homes elicit the relaxed calm of life at the beach with easy access to all the attractions the Grand Strand area has to offer.
